      • classSpecSplit

        public static weka.core.Instances[] classSpecSplit(weka.core.Instances input)
                                            throws Exception
        Split a dataset according to class indices. Accepts only nominal and string class attributes.
        Parameters:
        input - -- input dataset
        Returns:
        -- an array of splitted instances.
        Throws:
        Exception - when a dataset with a wrong attribute class has been passed.
        Since:
        0.4.0
